1.content: Ash Ketchem wants to become a girl all his life. Deciding that he really wants to become a girl so that he can enjoy his new life as a girl, where does he go to?
1.title: The adventure begins

11.content: Where or when does this happen?
11.title: Delia, his mom

choices: Delia catches Ash wearing girl's clothes
Ash tells her he wants to be a girly girl
111.title: Before the series began

1111.content: What sort of style does our crossdressing trainer seem to be going for?
1111.title: Delia catches Ash wearing girl's clothes

1112.content:
Delia took a deep breath.
"Are you telling me the truth, Ashy?" she inquired and looked at her son.
"Yes mom." Ash answered as his gaze met her's. "I want to be a girly girl."
His mother sighed, but cracked a smile.
"What do you want to be then?"
1112.title: Confession

11122.content:
"A lady, mom." Ash explained. "You know, one of those pretty ladies that wear the dresses and seem to be partake in girly activities."
"You realize it'll be a lot of work to reach your goal?" Delia responded and Ash nodded.
"I know that." her child responded and attempted to do a curtsy. While it wasn't that bad, he still had a lot of work to do. "So do we want to get my outfit first or start training me to act more like a girl?"
11122.title: Lady Ashley?

choices: The two find a purple dress
111221.content:
"Shopping." Delia answered and Ash perked up. "I'm guessing you're ready to go already?"
Ash nodded and the two headed out the door, making their way to a nearby clothing store and headed inside.
"So, what color do you want your dress to be?" his mother inquired.
"Lavender." Ash added as the two made their way over to the dresses. "But I'm flexible on that."
111221.title: Shopping

1112211.content:
While it did take some searching, the two managed to find the sort of dress Ash was looking for.
"Ready to try it on?" Delia asked.
"Sure." Ash answered and was handed the dress. He then made his way over to the stall and closed the door behind him. A few minutes later, he exited while wearing the dress. "How do I look?"
"Wonderful."
1112211.title: Success!

11122111.content:
The rest of the outfit was a similar story, with the gloves, heels and hat quickly acquired and paid for.
"Just one more thing, Ash." Delia explained and led the dressed up boy through the mall, eventually stopping at a small salon. "Ready to complete your transformation?"
Ash gave her a nod and the two walked in.
"What can I do for you?" the stylist inquired.
"My son would like to have his hair styled like one of those ladies." Delia answered.
"Sounds good."
The stylist then motioned for Ash to follow her, leading the trainer to a salon chair. What followed, was a mix of washing, shampooing and brushing of hair that transitioned into applying make-up and shaving all his body hair off. Though, the end result was well worth it.
"What do you think?"
"Perfect." Ash whispered.
11122111.title: Makeover

111221111.content:
With that, the two girls made their way home.
"We really should think of a better name for you, honey." Delia explained as the house came into view. "How about Aria?"
Ash perked up, giving her mother a nod.
"Aria it is." she whispered as the two headed inside. "Is there anything you want me to do, mom?"
Delia didn't answer and chose instead to give Aria a quick once over.
"You look the part, but you're not quite there yet."
111221111.title: Heading home

1112211111.content:
Sleep came quickly for Aria, as thoughts of learning filled her head.
When morning did finally arrive, she was up and getting her outfit on.
"I can do this." Aria thought as she stared into her mirror, cracking a smile. She then made her way downstairs, where Delia had chosen to dress in a similar outfit. Only her's was pink instead of purple.
"What do you think?" Delia inquired.
"It looks wonderful on you." Aria answered and focused back on her mother's face. "What are we going to start on?"
1112211111.title: Begin training tomorrow

11122111111.content:
"We are going to start with your general knowledge." Delia explained and handed Aria a magazine. "I want you to read this."
Aria gave a nod and sat herself down at the table, taking the magazine in.
At first it all seemed confusing in her head, with all the big words and interesting language. But as she pushed through it, Aria began to understand it. It spoke to her in a way nothing else had, as if the magazine had been created just for her.
"I'm guessing you're ready for your next lesson, Aria?" Delia inquired, her voice now sounding much more refined and beautiful now.
"Of course, mother." Aria answered.
11122111111.title: Knowledge

111221111111.content:
"Next we'll be doing makeup." Delia continued and pulled out a makeup kit. "We'll start with the basics."
What followed was a mix of hands-on and verbal instruction.
"How's this?"
Aria showed off her work, which was more than satisfactory in her mother's mind. But could still use work.
"Next lesson?"
"We'll do..."
111221111111.title: Makeup

choices: Aria goes off to get herself a pokemon
1112211111111.content:
"We'll work on your voice next." Delia continued. "Now repeat after me. I'm a beautiful lady."
Aria gave a nod.
"I'm a beautiful lady." she answered, only for her mother to shake her head.
"This time, try sound as feminine and refined as you can."
Another nod.
"I'm a beautiful lady, hon."
That time, Aria got a bit of clapping.
"I believe you are ready, Aria." Delia explained and watched her daughter smile. "Now, you need to begin your journey."
1112211111111.title: Voice work

choices: She's on time (Aria gets a fitting pokemon)
She's late (Aria's pokemon seems at odds with her appearance)
11122111111111.content:
The lab is not far from the Ketchum Household.
"I'm about to begin my pokemon journey." Aria thought, a smile already forming on her face. "This is the best day ever!"
Carefully, she walks as fast as she can. Which was actually pretty quick for being in heels.
"Welcome Aria."
Aria looked to her left, finding a female version of Professor Oak standing before her. Much like the beauty, she too was wearing a dress. Except her's was more of a wrap dress.
"Am I on time, professor?"
11122111111111.title: Aria goes off to get herself a pokemon

111221111111111.content:
"Yes you are, Aria." Oak explained, leading Aria over to the pokeballs. "On offer, we have Ralts, Bounsweet and Gothita."
Aria's attention shifted away from the professor and to the balls itself. She gave each one a look, eventually deciding upon...
111221111111111.title: She's on time (Aria gets a fitting pokemon)

1112211111111111.content: As Aria looks over the three Pokemon, she decides that she would rather have a grass or psychic type as they fit more with her trainer choice of being a “Lady”. After much deliberating, Aria looks to the professor and says, “I’ve made up my mind, I want...”
1112211111111111.title: Aria chooses Ralts/Bounsweet

11122111111111111.content:
...Bounsweet." Aria explained. Oak handing her the pokeball. She opened it up, finding the little grass pokemon. "It's nice to meet you."

Bounsweet let out a cute sound, a greeting of sorts. After, Aria turned her attention to Oak.

"Thank you." she remarked, picking her partner up and was handed the neccesary pokeballs and pokedex.

"Good luck,"

With that, Aria headed out.
11122111111111111.title: Bounsweet

choices: Does delia lend some clothes to Ash
111222.content: First a lady is always properly dressed, she also acts appropriately.
111222.title: Equiette Training

choices: clothes first it help you be more girly
no point of dresssing up if you cant act right.
111231.content:
A schoolgirl, mom." Ash explained. "You know, i just can't help how i feel wanting to be them could you hell me mom?"
"You realize it'll be a lot of work to reach your goal?" Delia responded and Ash nodded.
"I know that." her child responded and attempted to do a cute girly pose. While it wasn't truely bad, he still had a long time of hard work to do. "So do we want to get my outfit first or start training me to act more like a girl?"
111231.title: Schoolgirl

1112312.content:
"Now there no point in dressing up in cute girly clothes if you can't act like a girl now is there Ashly?" Delia said as she walk over to her son, well her soon to be daughter.
"So how are we going to work on that?" Ash asked.
"No half way. We are going to make you look, act, and think like a girl." She said pulling on ash hair and making him look her in the eyes. "We are going to work hard inside and out." She said as she forces him to stand on his toes. "Fallow me." She pull him along with her to her room. "Let see bra, panties, I'll have to order somethings, heels, makeup, and where did I aaaaa here it is." Delia said as she pull out a choker and high heels.
"Mom?" Ash asked.
"Little something from my younger days when I wanted to be a singer. The choker was made to strengthen volcal cords allowing for natural higher pitch than normal. Hold still it pinches a lot." She said as she wrapped it around ash neck and pull tight on it strangulating him. When she stop he could breathe.
"Mom that hurt a lot." Ash said not in his normal voice but a very high girlie voice that surprised him making him cover his mouth.
"See it working already. Now strip naked so I can help you pose and see what I can do about your body. Also tell me when your voice start cracking and become horse I have a way to soothe it." She said as she put the shoe on him.
1112312.title: no point of dresssing up if you cant act right.

111232.content: How about a team rocket grunt?
111232.title: Another choice

choices: Delia approves and want to join 'her'
Delia is against it, wanting Ash to pursue something
1112321.content:
"I want to be a female team rocket grunt, mom." Ash explained as Delia took a deep breath. "I want to be a bad girl who strikes fear in those that believe Team Rocket is a joke."
Once he finished his statement, Ash turned his attention to his mom.
"So, what do you think?"
1112321.title: Team Rocket Grunt Ashely

choices: Ashley wants to have Delia join her
Ashley wants to go it alone
11123211.content:
"I think that's wonderful, Ashley." Delia answered and Ash perked up. "I just have one question."
"And what would that be, Mom?" Ash responded, noticing his mom call him by his new name.
"Do you want to have me with you or do you want to go it alone?" Delia explained.
11123211.title: Approval and a choice

111232111.content:
"I want you to join me, mom." Ash answered. "Then, we can be the greatest Mother-Daughter team in Team Rocket."
"Wonderful, Ashley." Delia responded and cracked a smile. "There's just one thing."
"And what would that be?"
Delia didn't answer, instead motioning for the boy to get up.
111232111.title: Runs in the family

1112321111.content:
Ash quickly got up and followed his mom into bathroom, closing the door behind them.
What followed, was a complete transformation from head-to-toe.
"So, what do you think?" Delia inquired as 'Ash' looked into the mirror. Gone was the black-haired boy that had walked in, getting replaced with a pink-haired twin tail girl. Her brown eyes seemed to twinkle in the reflection, having been enhanced by a lot of make-up. The rest of the face was a similar story, having gotten a similar treatment. She was now dressed in a white sundress, going quite well to highlight her new b-cup breasts. A pair of white sandals covered her feet, going quite well with the white messenger bag by her side.
"I'm wonderful." Ashley whispered and cracked a smile. "Let's go get recruited by Team Rocket!"
1112321111.title: Ash's Rebirth

11123211111.content:
The duo quickly made their outside, making sure to stick to the shadows. If someone found out they were going to join Team Rocket, who knows what sort of punishment they would face. It was probably better to not think about it, instead choosing to just focus on the best paths to take to reach their destination. Once they reached Route 1, they eased up a little.
"Are you ready for this, Ashley?" Delia whispered, only for Ashley to perk up.
"Of course mom." her daughter answered and cracked a smile as they entered Viridian City.
Here, all that was left was to reach the back side of the Viridian Gym. Which was pretty much child's play for both of them. With that, they pulled the hatch up and headed inside...
11123211111.title: Getting there

111232111111.content:
Inside, the two found themselves in a small reception area. Manning it, was a woman dressed in a black latex blouse with a matching tube skirt and high heel boots.
A small red 'R' was situated over her left breast, seeming to compliment the tied back long jet black hair with a pair of dark blue eyes and red lips.
"Are you the latest two who want to join Team Rocket?" the woman inquired, only for Delia and Ashley to nod. "Good. Follow me."
111232111111.title: Recruitment

1112321111111.content:
The woman led them into a nearby room, where a pair of female grunts had been situated.
"They will take your measurements and get you fitted." she explained and exited the room.
"Thank you." Ashley whispered and turned her attention to the left grunt, taking a couple steps forward. "I'm ready to be fitted."
The grunt nodded, leading Ashley towards the back corner of the room.
1112321111111.title: Getting fitted

choices: Delia was wearing the same outfit
Delia was wearing a different outfit
11123211111111.content:
"I need you to strip down first." the grunt explained and turned away, allowing the 'girl' to change without looking eyes. Once she had done that, they turned back around with a tape measure. "Good. Let's get this over with."
What followed, was the person wrapping the tape measure around Ashley's body. It was an awkward yet necessary process to go through. Eventually, she was led to a small changing room.
"Let me get you your uniform."
It didn't take too long for the grunt to return with her uniform, handing it over. It consisted of the white team rocket top with a black undershirt and a white tube skirt. She quickly got all that stuff on, turning her attention to the black latex boots and matching gloves.
"Almost there, Ashley." she thought and got to work, fitting the last articles of clothing on and headed out, finding Delia standing before her...
11123211111111.title: Practical Uniform

111232111111111.content:
"We're a match." Delia remarked, watching her daughter crack a smile. "Ready to grab our first mission?"
"Yeah." Ashley answered and they headed off. Thankfully for our duo, the mission room was just a little bit further down the hall. "Here it is."
Carefully, the two pushed the doors open. Inside, they found a plain room with a laptop.
"I guess this is it."
The two made their way over, finding two missions already available for them.
111232111111111.title: Grunt Mother and Daughter

1112321111111111.content:
Recently, the nearby pokemon center had seen an increase in trainers, which meant an increase in pokemon to steal.
"I guess we know what we got to do." Delia explained, watching her daughter crack a smile. "Ready to do this?"
"Of course."
1112321111111111.title: Steal Pokemon

11123211111111111.content:
The job was a simple one, the duo slipping into the building at the dead of night.
After disabling the security system, their attention turns to the pokeball storage.
"You want me to grab the pokeballs while you tie up the Joy?" Ashley whispered, getting a nod from her mother. She got to work, sliding the balls into the bag they had been provided. Delia headed further into the building, roping up the sleeping joy.
Once they were both done, they headed back to where they entered. Slipping on through, the two were quite satisfied with what they had done.
Back at base, they deposited the pokeballs and debated their next move.
"Now what, mom?" Ashley whispered, clenching her mother's hand.
"We could..." Delia started...
11123211111111111.title: The duo is successful

choices: The pair runs into someone they weren't expecting too
111232111111111111.content:
"Take a break." the mother grunt continued, watching her daughter perk up.
As good as it might have been to run into another mission, it would be best to take some down time in order to recuperate. Maybe even make a friend or two.
"How about we go get a meal then?" Ashley answered.
"That sounds good."
With that, the pair made their way to the cafeteria and got themselves a meal.
It wasn't the best thing in the world, but it would do the job.
"I wonder what they'll be having us do next." Ashley whispered, taking a bite out of what looked to be rice. Hopefully.
"Maybe we'll get our own proper pokemon." Delia suggested and got a smile in return.
"Possibly."
The rest of the meal passed peacefully and the pair headed on.
111232111111111111.title: Take a break

1112321111111111111.content:
“Hi honey.”
Delia froze.
On one hand, it was nice to see a familiar face.
“Honey?” she called and took a step forward. Standing before the pair, was a female rocket grunt. She was dressed much the same way they had been, it was just that they had long black hair. Kind of like what Ashley’s was at one time. “It’s been awhile.”
The woman nodded and Ashley shot her mom a look.
“You are?” she whispered and got a deep breath from this mystery woman.
“I was your father,” the grunt explained and cracked a smile. “Though, I’m more of your mother now.”
He got a look from my her ex-wife.
“Well, other mother now.”
After hearing that, Ashley turned her attention to Delia.
“Can she join us, mom?”
1112321111111111111.title: Unexpected Arrival

111232111111111112.content:
"Get a new mission." she finished and the duo returned their attention to the terminal. "Let's see here..."
From the looks of things, there were only two missions on offer.

One was to help in the conversion of a new rocket agent.

While the other was just go steal pokemon.
111232111111111112.title: Get a new mission

111232111111112.content:
Unlike Ashley, Delia was wearing black team rocket top that went all the way down past her waist. A pair of high heel boots similar to Ashley's hung on her feet, with the only difference being them colored white with a red stripe. The gloves were a similar story, red stripe and all.
"So, what do you think?" Delia inquired, only for Ashley to smile.
"It looks nice on you." Ashley answered. "Though, these outfits feel incomplete."
"We could get some accessories."
111232111111112.title: Elite Delia and Grunt Ashley

1112321111111121.content:
"Yeah." Ashley responded and the two made their way down the hall, stopping a particular door. "Here it is."
Inside, the room was just as plain as all the others, but had the added benefit of at least having tables with all sorts of earrings on it.
"Which were you thinking?" Delia inquired and began to look over their options. Eventually, she came upon a pair of heart-shaped earrings. "These will work."
Ashley on the other hand, went for the teardrop earrings.
"Perfect."
With that out of the way, they headed out.
1112321111111121.title: Get accessories

11123211112.content:
Delia took a deep breath.
As much as she admired her daughter's excitement, they couldn't just charge into the base of Team Rocket. For now, they needed to take this one step at a time.
"Maybe in the future, honey." she explained, only for Ashley to sigh. "For now, let's work on your mannerisms."
11123211112.title: Not Yet

111232111122.content:
Three months had passed, bringing with it many changes to the Ketchum Household.
"Are you ready to head out, honey?" Delia called out, currently wearing what appeared to be a red cocktail dress and matching heels. She watched as Ashley ran on down, dressed in a pink princess dress covered in glitter and sequins. A pair of light pink opera gloves covered her arms and hands, complimenting her long pink hair and large brown eyes.
"Do I have to wear this, mom?" the trainer inquired and Delia giggled. "This feels so off."
"Yes, but this our chance to prove ourselves!" her mother announced
111232111122.title: Skip Ahead

choices: The mission is failed in some way
1112321111221.content:
The destination in question was a party on the outskirts of Pallet Town.
There, they would slip in and acquire as many of the trainer's pokemon as possible. Well, that was the plan, whether or not it would go that way was yet to be determined by either gal.
1112321111221.title: Stay with them

1112321111222.content:
Three more months passed, bringing another wave of changes to the Ketchum's.
"I did it, mom!' a voice announced and Ashley came running in, waving a pair of envelopes around. "They accepted us into the academy!"
"That's wonderful." Delia answered. "I'm guessing we should probably get going?"
Ashley nodded and the two headed out.
1112321111222.title: Skip ahead more

1112322.content: How about an Officer Jenny?
1112322.title: Officer Jenny?

11123221.content:
"I want to be an Officer Jenny, mom." Ash explained.
"Are you sure, honey?" Delia asked and stared towards her son. "They might not accept you at the academy."
"I can manage."
Delia took a deep breath and smiled. Her son was going to be an Officer Jenny, possibly even one of the very best.
11123221.title: Decision

choices: "He can join our academy." she answered.
"He can join our academy, but he'll need parental supervision." she explained
111232211.content:
With that, the two made their way out of the Ketchum House, quickly making their way too the other side of Pallet Town. There, the Officer Jenny Academy stood in all it's glory.
"Are you ready for this?" Delia asked and Ash gave her a nod, with the two heading in right after. "I would like to enroll my son in your academy."
The Officer Jenny at the reception looked Ash over, but returned to whatever she was working on. Though, a few seconds later she did respond...
111232211.title: Enrollment

1112322111.content:
"He can join our academy." she answered and Ash perked up. "But he'll have to look the part, which we'll help him with."
"Of course." Delia answered and gave her child one more hug. "Do your best honey!"
"I will mom!" Ash answered as the jenny led him inside.
1112322111.title: Entrance

1112322112.content:
"He can join our academy, but he'll need parental supervision." she explained.
"Are you fine with that, Ash?" Delia called out and watched her son perk up.
"That's even better!" her son answered, jumping up and down in celebration.
Delia let out a deep breath and cracked a smile towards the Officer Jenny.
"Understood." the jenny answered and led the two inside. "We'll start off with..."
1112322112.title: Mother and Son

11123221121.content:
With that now out of the way, the pair was led down the hall and into a nearby room.
Inside, the room was kind of plain. A single Jenny stood patiently, a tape measure in hand.
"I need you two to hold still." the Jenny explained, making her way over to Delia. What follows, was the tape measure being wrapped around various areas of her stomach. Then it was Ash's turn. "So you want to be a Jenny, huh?"
Ash nodded.
"Then you'll need to be looking the part."
Delia let out a chuckle, watching the officer hang the tape measure up.
"I'll be back in a minute."
11123221121.title: Uniform Fitting

111232211211.content:
Like the Jenny said, she returned with a pair of uniforms.
What followed, was both Ash and Delia getting the garments and shoes on.
"What do you think, mom?" Ash inquired and watched his mom look at him.
"You look quite nice, for a Jenny." Delia answered as she slipped her heels on. "There. We're sort of a match."
Ash nodded.
111232211211.title: Fitting

choices: Everything they need to know is imprinted into their heads
1112322112111.content:
It didn't take either Jenny-in-training too long to reach their destination.
Inside, the classroom was actually quite empty.
Only one Officer Jenny was standing in there.
"Is this the class?" Ash inquired and got a nod as the pair entered.
"Yep." the jenny answered and motioned for them to take a seat. The two did just that. "Now..."
A screen came down right after.
1112322112111.title: To Class

111232222.content: How about a kimono girl?
111232222.title: Kimono Girl

1112322221.content:
"I want to be a kimono girl." Ash explained and Delia took a deep breath.
"Are you sure?" his mother remarked and watched Ash shake his head. "Fine."
With that, the two made their way to the bathroom.
"The first thing about becoming a kimono girl is looking the part." Delia continued and pulled out a small can of white costume paint. "Now, hold still."
Ash complied, letting his face painted over. This was then followed by a coat of lipstick and tying of his hair into a bun.
"Next up..."
1112322221.title: Kimono Opportunities

11123222211.content:
"We need to get you a ladies kimono." Delia continued and stepped out of the room.
When she did return, she was now holding a light blue kimono with an orange obi.
"How does this look?"
Ash flashed her a thumbs-up and fitted it on.
"Now what?"
11123222211.title: Kimono Fitting

1112322222.content: How about a southern belle?
1112322222.title: Southern Belle

111232222221.content:
"Are you sure about this, Ash?" Delia inquired as the two stood before the boutique
"I'm sure, mom." Ash answered and cracked a smile. "When I come out, I'll be full-on princess."
With that, the boy headed inside...
111232222221.title: To be a princess

1112322222211.content:
"I'm here for my makeover." Ash explained as he reached the reception desk.
"Of course." the receptionist answered. "For the moment, please take a seat."
The boy sat himself down and began to look through the latest volume of Poke Princess Altina.
"Not too much longer." he thought and stared down into the book, which was currently showing the titular main character transforming. In a way, he wanted to just like that. A pretty princess, clothed in pink.
"Ash Ketchum."
"Yes?" the boy answered, only to notice a woman at the edge of the room.
"We are ready to start your makeover?"
"Of course."
1112322222211.title: The Makeover

11123222222112.content: What kind of princess is Ash now?
11123222222112.title: Skip ahead

111232222221121.content:
"Mommy!"
Delia did a double take.
Gone was the black haired boy that wanted to be a princess, now stood a girl dressed in what appeared to be a pink gown with puffed up sleeves. A pair of matching heels clicked against the ground, complementing the pink opera gloves and stockings. A tiara hung in her now dandelion blonde hairs, which now went down to her waist.
"What a wonderful princess you are." Delia whispered and examined her daughter.
111232222221121.title: Princess Ashley

1112322222211212.content:
With that, Ashley and Delia headed off.
"There you are!" a voice announced and the two turned around. There, Gary stood in all his triumphance.
"Gary..." Delia whispered as Ashley's rival ran over, taking in her princess daughter.
"I always thought that such a damsel fits you best." Gary taunted as Ashley just stood there. "Hopefully, you find your prince!"
Ashley took a deep breath and decided...
1112322222211212.title: Gary's Taunting

11123222222112122.content:
"If you're so confident in your 'superiority', why don't you become a princess yourself?" Ashley responded and grabbed onto Gary's shoulders. "That's only fair, right?"
Gary didn't even try to resist as Ashley carefully pushed her rival over to the salon. Fifteen minutes gleefully, with Delia dropping some stuff and returning to see what remained of Ashley's rival.
"Oh my." she remarked and took it in. Gary had been dressed in a purple version of Ashley's outfit, with the only difference being the two large drills of brown hair hanging down from her head. "Now, what's your name?"
"Gabriella..." 'Gary' whispered as Ashley smiled.
11123222222112122.title: Princess Sisters

choices: Skip to the end of the makeover.
111232222221121222.content:
"You know what," Delia remarked and turned to her 'daughters'. "Mommy is going to join you."
And with that, she skipped inside.
111232222221121222.title: Royal Trio

1112322222211212222.content:
After a few minutes of waiting, Delia emerged.
Gone was the plain and simple housewife, getting replaced with a refined and loving woman. A ballroom gown touched down to the pavement, decorated with sequins, ribbons, bows and frills for all to see. A coat of makeup covered her face, while her brown hair had styled into a fontange.
"Let's go home, girls," Delia explained.
1112322222211212222.title: Queen Delia

choices: The house changes during the night
11123222222112122221.content:
The walk home was surprisingly peaceful for our trio.
While their dresses did seem to drag on the pavement, they just pulled the skirt up slightly.
"Very good girls." Delia chimed in, watching her 'daughters' blush a bright shade of red. A chuckle followed, with both of them accepting their new lives for the moment. "While not quite a castle, we can expand our home to become one."
Nods from both girls as the Ketchum 'Castle' came into view.
"Night night."
Once inside, they found a place to hang their dresses and headed for bed, all three of them together.
11123222222112122221.title: They head home

111232222221122.content:
What kind of Princess?

Girly Girl = Princess Peach/Daisy
Tomboy = Ayeka Masaki Jurai
Disney = any of theme
111232222221122.title: Different sort of princess

111232222221122121.content:
"Mommy!"

choices: Serena says yes. She still loves him.

155332222221222112.content:
When Serena reminded Ash of how they met years ago at Professor Oak's summer camp, he was happy. He remembered the "straw hat girl" in her pink clothes that he helped back then. It was seeing her back then that panted the seeds in Ashs mind of wantin to be a girl. However, the sadness he felt when she "disappeared" after the camp was over, he suppressed those desires.

When they reunited in the Kalos region, all those suppressed feelings of wanting to be a girl came out of him and he also found out where she went all those years ago; she didn't live in Kanto, but instead went back home to the Kalos region.

However, it soon became apparent to Ash that Serena had a crush on him. He wasn't sure how Serena would react to his true desires, so he pretended to be obliviouss to her crush on him. However, the more they travelled, the harder it became for Ash to hold his desires. He was falling in love with Serena, but he was also jealois of her as well. He wanted to wear the same type of clothes as her and be completely open with her, but he was still afraid.

One day, when Clemont and Bonnie were separated from them to collect wood and get food, Ash readied his nerves to get it over with. Would she hate him or would she still love him when she discovered the truth?

"Serena?" asked Ash to get her attention.

"Yes, Ash?" responded Serena, turning towards Ash.

"There's something important to tell you."

"What is it?" asked Serena as she started to blush, assuming that Ash was about to confess to her.

"I...I want to be a girl! Will you help me, Serena?"
155332222221222112.title: Sometime after Serena started travelling with A...

choices: Serena takes Ashley to the nearest town/village.
Serena decides to give Ashley a makeover.
1553322222212221121.content:
Serena was surprised by what Ash had said. She never thought that Ash had desired to be a girl. When she looked at Ash's face, Serena thought that Ash looked more vulnerable and scared than she had ever seen. She could see in his eyes that he was both fearful and hopeful about her response; fearing for the worst but hoping for the best.

Seeing how much Ash was opening to her, she not only made up her decision, but also fell even more in love with Ash.

Serena walked up to Ash and surprised him by giving Ash a huge hug, which started to relax him.

"If you want me to help you become a girl, then I will do that. You're one of the bravest people I know and your courage helps me whenever I'm down. Boy or girl, you are still the one I love."

Serena broke from her hug a bit as she got a huge blush on her face that she had just confessed to Ash. Ash smiled at her and even let out some happy tears.

"You don't know how happy you just made me, Serena. The truth is, I love you too (At this point Serena asped in surprise). I was just so afraid of how you'd react to my biggest secret, that I pretended not to notice your feelings to me and I tried to keep my own feelings hidden. And you're also an inspiration to me too. Ever since we met as kids, I have admired your sense of style. You're why I wanted to become a girl in the first place and you're the type of girl I want to be."

Serena also let out tears of joy as she hugged Ash again. "We are both idiots, huh, Ash? If only we were both more honest, we could have avoided this sense of hiding feelings and secrets from each other."

"Better late than never I suppose. And don't call me Ash anymore. Call me Ashley."

Serena smiled at the name. "Ok, Ashley."
1553322222212221121.title: Serena says yes. She still loves him.

choices: Ashley wantst to still try to be a Pokemon Master.
Ashley wants to try to become Kalos Queen.
Ashley decides on a different dream.
15533222222122211213.content:
"Ashley, I want to ask you something that is important to what we do next."

"What is it, Serena?"

"For all the time we have been travelling, you've been challenging Gyms to eventually compete in the Kalos League in your dream to become a Pokemon Master. As for me, you know that initially I didn't know what my dream was. I eventually learned about Pokemon Showcases and that the best is known as the "Kalos Queen". While I have yet to actually preform in my first Showcase yet, I'm practicing hard and I plan to give it my all."

Serena got a more serious face.

"My question is, what is your dream? Are you still trying to become a Pokemon Master and compete in Gyms and Leagues? Or do you want to try to become Kalos Queen, which would make us rivals? Or perhaps you've thought of something else? Know that whatever you choose, I'll support you. But if you chose to be my rival to try to become Kalos Queen, that would require a lot more work to make you a girl than some other goals."

Ashley realized that what Serena said made a lot of sense. He'd be lying if he said a part of him wasn't intrigued by Pokemon Showcases when he learned about them. And directly competing with Serena would be interesting. But did he actually want to become a Pokemon Performer and retire from challenging gyms and Leagues? He had been doing that for so long, after all.

“I need more time fo consider your offer”
15533222222122222111212.content:
A few months had passed and Ash was still acting like a female Buneary. However, as time went on this was becoming easier and easier for Ash. On some day’s Ash wasn’t even conscientious of “acting” like a female Buneary and rather just was one. Ash even started to enjoy being a Pokemon. She (now refers to self as female pronoun) likes battles, being with her trainer, and being around the other Pokemon, but she most especially liked being around Bunnelby.

As Ash continued to wait for a cure to become human again, she started to realize that her acting had started to become more of a reality. Ash didn’t want to admit it but she was also starting to have feelings towards Bunnelby. They had gotten so close during this time, it was only natural, Ash thought from time to time. However, whenever these feelings emerged Ash tried to repress these thoughts and hold onto her goal of becoming human once again. This too though was in question as Pikachu and Greninja has yet to come up with any solid way of changing Ash back.

One day, Bunnelby came up to Ash and said,

“Hey Buneary, I know we have been together for a while now but I was wondering if you might like to take this to the next level.”

Ash saw how bashful he looked while saying this and could help but smile. He looked just so cute.

“What do you mean?” Ash replied.

“Well you see we have been talking and getting to know each other, but have yet to get physical”

At this Ash blushed but remained silent, Bunnelby continued.

“And I was wondering if you might, you know, be willing to become...ma..mates, or soulmates?”

At this Bunnelby covered his face with embarrassment.

“Sorry, again no pressure but I just like you so much and it seems you like me to, so what do you say?”

Ash was taken aback at this. She understood what Bunnelby was saying and was honestly quite flattered, but to take this leap might mean forfeiting his life as a human. Ash did admit, she liked Bunnelby, but this was a lot to consider. On the other, there seemed to be no progress in getting Ash back to a human form and it might not be a bad life staying as a Buneary. Who knows, maybe she would like it more. These thoughts were swirling around Ash’s head when she was interrupted by Bunnelby.

“I don’t mean to pry because I know this is a big request to ask, but I would love to hear your answer”

Ash stopped thinking for a moment and decided to go with her gut,

“Bunnelby, I’m flattered by this. It is a lot to consider but I think...”

info.brief_description: Ash is transformed into a girl
info.description:
You can transform Ash from Pokemon into a girl.

How you want to change Ash into a girl is up to you.

TG is absolute

The way you want Ash to transform into a girl, the choices are endless.

Lesbian and incest are alright, but don't focus too much on straight, because we want to have Ash live out his fantasies as a girl.

You can have at times, have Ash turn into a animal, but it would be ones like dogs and cats, a specific pet that Ash has a hard body.
